8.5 Fouri .... Sefi ... : Linear Algebra 10< Functions 4 37 
FOURIER SERIES: LINEAR ALGEBRA FOR FUNCTIONS. 8.5 
This section goes from finite dimensions to infinite dimensions. I want to explain linear 
algebra in infinite-dimensional space. and to show that it still works. First step: look 
back. This book began with vectors and dot products and linear combinations. We 
begin by conveniog those basic ideas to the infinite case-then the rest will follow.
